explains: v. <正式>合并，联合；使（元素）结合

sentences.en: As the number of moisture droplets increases, they begin to coalesce into small rivulets of fluid.
sentences.cn: 当水滴数量增加，它们会汇集成细流。

sentences.en: Operations to split and to coalesce chunks take time.
sentences.cn: 用于分割和合并块的操作需要花费时间。

sentences.en: The allocator can't coalesce free space into larger blocks.
sentences.cn: 分配程序不能将空闲空间拼合为更大的内存块。
